topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b8c3856368727ebba20800#post_54b8c3856368727ebba20800
Solid Snake had both eyes.
Raiden had both eyes.
Naked Snake had both eyes until [spoiler]a bullet grazed his right eye,[/spoiler]
Old Snake had both eyes but one was covered by the Solid Eye System.
Big Boss wore an eyepatch during Peace Walker.
Punished Snake is gonna have his eyepatch in The Phantom Pain
And Raiden lost an eye during the events of Revengeance
